name: Multi Legged Encounter – Or The Famous Bug-Hunt
description:
At night the forest floor wakes up and anything can happen. And if you are brave enough you will join me in a heroic quest, you will join me in one of my bug-hunts.

You will enter a dark tropical forest not too far from town, but far enough to feel the adrenalin arriving to your system. You know every second of the hunt that you are not alone. Are those noises all come from insects? Let’s hope so, right?
